titleStmt.title: An auction of paintings most of them being from the collections of Prince Ludovico and General Doushfeild lately brought over and consisting of the works of Guido Rheno. ... Bambotts, &c. Will be on Fryday and Saturday the 22d. and 23d. of this instant January, at the Vendu next Bedford-gate in Charles-street Covent-Garden, beginning at 4 precisely, and will be sold the fair way according to the course of the catalogue. A large collection will be continued every Fryday following during the gentrys stay in town, sold by Edward Millington, where is likewise a curious invention of lights, whereby the pictures may be seen as well as by day, the conditions of sale are, ...
titleStmt.author: Millington, Edward, d. 1703.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
